Enclosing class:
Behavior<T extends Element<T>>
public abstract static class Behavior.Capturing<T extends Element<T>> extends Behavior.Click<T>
A click behavior that captures the pointer and optionally issues clicks based on some time based function.

    • onRelease

      public boolean onRelease(Pointer.Interaction iact)
      Description copied from class: Behavior
      Called when the pointer is released after having been pressed on this widget. This should return true if the gesture is considered a click, in which case Behavior.onClick(playn.scene.Pointer.Interaction) will be called automatically.
      Overrides:
      onRelease in class Behavior.Select<T extends Element<T>>
